channel.title: 762 ItemsList [XML]
channel.description: So if anyone cares to browse this. Here's a list of all of RuneScapes item's (currently?) It's in an XML format. It contains the shop value, ground actions (6 options), inventory actions (5 options), if it's members only, noted, stackable, wield location, ID, and Name. ^I think that's all. Anyways, here you go: [url=http://up.ht/16DZjCK]Click me to download[/url]

item.title: 762 ItemsList [XML]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:520631”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=639129.msg4308318#msg4308318 date=1370306229]

rep++ oh wait…

I mean thanks!

Rep-- to you.
JK I would never.
[/quote]lol I used to find it funny when people would derep me and within 10 minutes I would be 200 again xD…[/quote]
I remember when I got hacked and someone posted asking for rep on my account.
I never lived that down.

Read full topic
